p: Thirteen models from the CMIP5 family were considered in this study, name of which along with their respective grid resolutions are listed in Supplementary Table 1. PM 2.5 was estimated from each of the models for the period 2011 up to 2100 for RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios following two approaches. Estimated PM 2.5 by each model was downscaled statistically to 0.5° × 0.5° resolution to negate the inconsistency among the grid resolutions of these 13 models and to be at par with the resolution of MISR-retrieved PM 2.5.
